> People don't get to come up with their own definition of species. It is a scientific word with a precise definition. It is the lowest tier in our taxonomic ranking system after genus.


Where did you get that idea?


There's plenty of disagreement when it comes to defining species even among eminent scientists. So much so there are even split into rival groups. Genetics has helped massively but there will never be absolute precise methods of determining species.
